commit.message: DSTify Show and all the other formatting traits

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@

+
+#[deriving(Show)]
+struct Foo(Box<[u8]>);
+
+pub fn main() {
+    println!("{}", Foo(box [0, 1, 2]));
+}
